page.title: 03INDUSTRIAL SITE
page.content:
There is an industrial site in West Horndon. West Horndon was not a particularly good place for the site originally, but the land was availble. Now,however, there are many advantages because it is near to the railway, M25, A128, and the A127.The industral site has about 600 or more employed altogether and they come from as far away as Romford and Southend,on trains and buses.A few come from West Horndon.Most people work set hours,but some firms work over_time when they are very busy.
There are 22 companies on the whole of the site. They are mainly packaging and distribution, but there are also a few light manufacturing industries. {
